segments.text: Good morning ! Marquette General Hospital . Tia speaking . May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi , this is Emily Wang , I want to see a doctor today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks . Do you have an appointment , Ms . Wang ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . But it is urgent , and I need to see a doctor as soon as possible . I am really in bad shape .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have a high fever and a bad headache .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I took my temperature last night . It was 102 degrees . But right now I feel my fevers is up to 103 degrees .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can not stop coughing , and I can not stop sneezing . I vomited blood last night . Sorry , I am coughing again .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , you can come to a work-in clinic today . You do not need an appointment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Any time between 8 a . m . to 9 p . m .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are very welcome . Anything else I can do for you today ?
segments.speaker: S1
